articles.title: Europe Just Suspended Its Mars Rover Mission, Cutting Ties With Russia - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has unanimously voted to suspend a joint Mars mission with Russia. The mission was slated to blast off for the Red Planet later this year, but that launch is now on hold indefinitely.
